description: If the number is divisible by 3 and 5, the output is "FizzBuzz".
condition: FUNCTION MOD(COUNTER, 3) IS EQUAL TO ZERO AND FUNCTION MOD(COUNTER, 5) IS EQUAL TO ZERO

description: If the number is divisible by 3, the output is "Fizz".
condition: FUNCTION MOD(COUNTER, 3) IS EQUAL TO ZERO

description: If the number is divisible by 5, the output is "Buzz".
condition: FUNCTION MOD(COUNTER, 5) IS EQUAL TO ZERO

description: If the number is not divisible by 3 or 5, the output is the number itself.
